text: The Brazilian Institute of Geography and Statistics or IBGE (), is the government agency responsible for statistical, geographic, cartographic, geodetic and environmental information in Brazil. The IBGE performs a national census every ten years, and the questionnaires account for information such as age, household income, literacy, education, occupation and hygiene levels. The IBGE's headquarters is located in Rio de Janeiro. == Other websites == * IBGE website Category:Buildings and structures in Rio de Janeiro Category:Government agencies Category:Organizations based in Rio de Janeiro Category:Statistics organizations
title: Brazilian Institute of Geography and Statistics
